reviews.text: Great station since they refurbished it. It has a proper Costa coffee shop as well as better ticketing facilities. Friendly staff and decent waiting room on the north end of the platform + 1st class lounge on the platform at the southern end.
Nice easy pick up point for coaches.

Took my husband to catch London train yesterday, arrived early looking forward to coffee (husband is diabetic and we had come from Jedburgh so refreshment needed!).  We have often found cafe closed but this time it had disappeared all together!  This station which caters for long distance travellers (or rather doesn't!) needs to get its' act together.
Standard train station, a bit shabby in places. 1st class lounge is nothing more than a gimmick and really not worth bothering with. The seating is better in the standard lounge.
